column4: kay folx ... I was over at #ubuntu-offtopic, but I think they're all asleep.  Here's my little issue.  I am using a Dapper machine that seems to have some broken packages ... which is no big deal really.  Except that if I try to burn some data to a DVD using gnome's built in app, it tells me to insert cd-r/rw media ... but it's a dvd burner ... with a DVD in it.
Oh look at that, the folx over at -offtopic woke up!  sorry to bug you here ...
My old ubuntu machine behaved the same way. Asked for a cd-r/rw when I tried to burn a dvd. Haven't tried on this newly installed machine though
cool.  I'll get it working eventually.
